edu.rit.m2mi.life3
Interface LifeCell

All Superinterfaces:
LifeCellListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
LifeCellImpl
public interface LifeCell
extends LifeCellListener

Interface LifeCell specifies the interface for an exported object that encapsulates a cell in the Game of Life (version 3).

M2MI Library Version 02-Jul-2002

Method Summary
 void next()
          Finish a round and start the next round.
 void setState(boolean state)
          Set the state of this cell.
 void start()
          Start a round.
 
Methods inherited from interface edu.rit.m2mi.life3.LifeCellListener
receiveState
 

Method Detail

setState

public void setState(boolean state)
Set the state of this cell. Do not report the state to this cell's listeners.

Parameters:
state - State of the cell: true = live, false = dead.

start

public void start()
Start a round. Report this cell's state to this cell's listeners.

next

public void next()
Finish a round and start the next round. Set the state of this cell to its previously calculated next state and report the new state to this cell's listeners.
